description: Summertime sips are meant to be light, bright and sparky. This tropical gin fizz ticks all the boxes, and looks like a glass of sunshine to boot.
name: Pineapple & Passionfruit Gin Fizz Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 passionfruit, halved, plus 1 wedge of passionfruit for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Juice 1 lemon half. Thinly slice remaining half. Strain half of the passionfruit pulp into a small jug. Discard seeds. Add lemon juice.
Pour juice mixture into a 300ml-capacity tall glass. Add cordial, sugar syrup and gin. Stir.
Add crushed ice and remaining passionfruit pulp, then top up with soda water. Garnish with lemon slices and passionfruit wedge. Serve.
